command.name: lite-fix
command.description: Lightweight bug diagnosis and fix workflow with intelligent severity assessment and optional hotfix mode for production incidents

intent.primary_user_value: Quickly assess bug severity, run targeted multi-angle diagnosis, produce a fix plan, and optionally hand off execution to /workflow:lite-execute.

must_not: Do not claim implementation pointers are Existing unless verifiable in the repo now.
Avoid destructive actions without explicit user request; prefer minimal, reversible fixes unless --hotfix requires otherwise.

p0: Frontmatter fields present and allowed-tools match requirement
Produces a structured fix plan and session artifacts under .workflow/lite-fix/<session>/
Delegates execution to /workflow:lite-execute with the collected context
